/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/bin/c++    -Wl,-rpath=/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/lib64 -Wl,-rpath=/opt/rh/devtoolset-7/root/usr/lib -rdynamic CMakeFiles/simpleCUDPP.dir/scan_gold.cpp.o CMakeFiles/simpleCUDPP.dir/simpleCUDPP_generated_simpleCUDPP.cu.o  -o simpleCUDPP   -L/public/home/mzy6562523/Tests/cudpp-master/apps/simpleCUDPP/../../build/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/public/home/mzy6562523/Tests/cudpp-master/apps/simpleCUDPP/../../build/lib /public/home/mzy6562523/tools/dtk-23.04.1/cuda/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl -lrt -lcudpp -lpthread
